fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives:
- EU Global Strategy 
- EU Common Foreign and Security Policy 
- Key transatlantic policies such as TTIP, data policy, elections and so on
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Our mission is to foster the next generation of foreign policy leaders through events, networking and workshops. We have branches in DC, New York, London and Brussels (only the DC office has a physical office).  
 
All our Brussels based team are young volunteers, with a commitment to engage in foreign policy and a desire to learn through on-the-job training.
relevant_communication:
- Regular events on a wide variety of EU, global and foreign policy issues 
- Trainings and workshops on foreign policy tradecraft 
- Regular communications through our social media, newsletter and blogs
